title: Blazor Skribbl
description: Web game inspired by popular multiplayer drawing game - Skribbl. Lobby management, custom authentification & realtime drawing made with Blazor WASM and SignalR Core.

title: Next Fixtures
description: Website showing upcoming football matches in the top five european leagues. Clubs logo are webscraped from the internet. Possibility to select a range of dates, leagues using an edit form or by directly modifying search query.

title: Url Shortener
description: Url shortener made with Blazor Server. Website allows to signup to the service and to skip ads on redirect. Users also can buy premium account which gives them a possibility to choose a custom short link ending.

title: Sorting Algorithms
description: Sorting algorithms visualization made with Unity game engine. Thanks to this project I learned more about algorithms and command design pattern.

title: Evacuation Simulation
description: University assignment. Our objectif was to simulate evacuation of crowd from modifiable building.

title: Global Warming
description: University assignement. This program helps to visualize evolution of global temperatures over the years. This project was really interesting to work on, because I had to use knowledge from most subjects, like user experience.

title: UDP & TCP
description: University assignment. Clients and servers using UDP and TCP protocols for Linux.
